explanation: [0-0] On a sunny outdoor deck, a long-haired woman in a bikini is standing, her body wrapped in a white towel, with a red logo below.

[0-6] First, the camera pans left. The long-haired woman holds a phone in her left hand, the towel drops to her chest, she pulls it up with her right hand, raises her right hand and waves with a smile. A man in blue shorts, holding a white towel, appears to her left. He looks to the right. The woman walks to the right side of the man in blue shorts. He lifts his left foot and steps onto the deck. The color of the red logo below is constantly changing.
